name: Cosmic Voyagers
description: Different data set for testing gallery rendering - Space theme

cards.title: Phoenix Rising
cards.subtitle: Rebirth Champion
cards.description: Born from the ashes of a dying star, this entity represents eternal renewal.

cards.title: Ice Wizard
cards.subtitle: Frost Master
cards.description: Commands the frozen winds of the polar vortex with absolute precision.

cards.title: Nebula Knight
cards.subtitle: Star Guardian
cards.description: Armored in condensed starlight, defending galaxies from the void.

cards.title: Void Walker
cards.subtitle: Space Drifter
cards.description: Traverses the emptiness between stars, seeking lost civilizations.

cards.title: Asteroid Miner
cards.subtitle: Resource Gatherer
cards.description: A hardworking soul extracting precious minerals from space rocks.
